testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Text Module Level 3 (Partial)
testcase.purpose: To check if the WRT CSS3 find hidden text features can compliance with relevant test scripts' descriptions

step.step_desc: Use WRT to visit the "Test script entry" to check if all test scripts execution results.
step.expected: Find out all the expected strings, and the unexpected string should not be gotten.

testcase.purpose: Check width of the first to third characters are same by script and return true or false

step.step_desc: Use WRT to visit the "Test script entry" to check if the width of the first to the third characters are same by script and return true or false

testcase.purpose: To check that ' ' and space are same

step.step_desc: Use WRT to visit the "justify-nbsp" to check if the " " and space are same

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Text Module Level 3 (Partial)
testcase.purpose: Check the CSS text-shadow:-5px -5px blue is rendered properly

step.step_desc: Use WRT to visit the "shadow-no-blur" to check if the CSS text-shadow:-5px -5px blue is rendered properly.
step.expected: Shadow display in the upward to 5 pixel and Towards the left 5 pixel location

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Text Module Level 3 (Partial)
testcase.purpose: Test that the intensity of text-shadow does not depend on the transparency of the text fill color but the value of green 0 36px 0

step.step_desc: Use WRT to visit the "shadow-translucent" to check if the intensity of text-shadow does not depend on the transparency of the text fill colorr but the value of green 0 36px 0
step.expected: There should be three identical green squares on the line above

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Text Module Level 3 (Partial)
testcase.purpose: To check that word-break properly shrinks a cell to one character per line when it is set to break-all

step.step_desc: Use WRT to visit the "word-break" to check word-break properly shrinks a cell to one character per line when it is set to break-all
step.expected: The word-break properly shrinks a cell to one character per line when it is set to break-all
